## TCacheKey type

If undefined, the component should not attempt to save or load properties from local storage. Otherwise this string should be used to identify a component’s intention; user preferences and potentially other properties will be saved to and loaded from the local storage for a user’s client by this key.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type TCacheKey = string | undefined;
```
